attributes.action: Driving licence holders to be retested for theory and eyesight every 10 years
attributes.additional_details:
If you want to see if you have the required knowledge then take this test https://www.safedrivingforlife.info/take-official-free-practice-driving-theory-test/car-practice-theory-tests/car-practice-test-one#start-test

If you want to check your eyesight try reading a number plate from 20.5 meters (approx 4-5 car length)
attributes.background: With UK roads getting busier and the number of accidents being so high, action needs to be taken to ensure that the drivers understand their responsibilities, and have suitable eyesight to ensure they can react as early as possible to hazards.
